extendedInfo.description: Solitaire City is a collection of your favourite solitaire card games. It is optimized to look and play great on both phones and tablets taking full advantage of any size screen, even full HD devices. If you're a solitaire fan then you have to try Solitaire City! This download is completely FREE and contains two games from the full version - Spiderette and Double Klondike. Unfamiliar with a particular solitaire game? No problem - a unique training system is included that teaches you the game rules and points out valid moves as you play. No more confusing rules to read; learn as you play! Solitaire City is famous for its addictive timed scoring system which results in countless battles trying to beat the scores of players from all around the world and see your name in lights. Scoreloop technology provides the means to view everyone's scores via online leaderboards. If you can't compete in the big leagues then create a list of friends and view each otherâs scores on your own private leaderboards. Solitaire City works on all Android devices and adjusts its graphics to suit phones and tablets from small, low resolution screens to full High Definition tablets. You can rest assured that Solitaire City will take advantage of the latest technology when it's available. Flip your device to play in either portrait or landscape orientations and customize the game's cards, background graphics and sound effects to suit your tastes.FREE GAMES* Spiderette One, Two and Four Suits* Double Klondike Deal 1 and Deal 3IN-APP PURCHASEUpgrade to Solitaire City Deluxe with a single In-App Purchase and enjoy the following solitaire games too:* Klondike Deal 1, Deal 3 and Vegas Rules  (also known as Classic solitaire or Patience)* Spider One, Two and Four Suits* FreeCell (7 variations including Microsoft game numbers)* Pyramid (4 variations)* Poker Squares (4 variations)* Golf solitaire (4 variations)* Alternations (4 variations)* Tri-Peaks (2 variations)** Three Shuffles and a Draw* Eliminator (3 variations)* Casket (2 variations)* Yukon (3 variations)* Demon/Canfield (4 variations)* Cribbage Squares (3 variations)** La Belle Lucie** Demon Fan** Shamrocks** Super Flower Garden ** Fan** Three Shuffles and a Draw,  La Belle Lucie, Demon Fan, Shamrocks, Fan and Super Flower Garden can be found under the "Fan Games" section as separate game Rules.FEATURES* Phone and Tablet support* Graphics adjust to take advantage of all displays* Support for HD screens* Landscape & portrait support* Rotate the device during play to switch orientation* Timed scoring system* Scoreloop online leaderboards (play offline too)* Impressive graphical effects* Statistics* Fun sound effects and sound themes* Create your own sound themes* Atmospheric background graphics* Choice of detailed card designs* Interactive training* Unlimited undos* Saves the game position when the phone rings* Left and right handed options* Serious addiction!Please try our other Android game, 10 Pin Shuffle. Just search Google play for 10 Pin Shuffle.

reviews.title: Excellent but . .
reviews.comment: Huge fan of this on iOS, probably my most played app over several years. Switching to Android recently I was relieved to see this available. Now it\'s still the best solitaire available but running on my HTC One it just isn\'t at smooth as the iOS version. I do hope it can be optimized a little more so it matches the overall performance of the iOS version. Still a great title though.
reviews.author: Chris Whitney

reviews.title: Getting better!
reviews.comment: I have been playing the games consistently on my ipad without issues.  Was pleased to find the android version for my Galaxy Note II.   Issues I have experienced have been on previous comments; eg. after pausing and your screen times out, your cards are all face down.  I\'ve kinda bypassed this problem by just exiting the game without pausing it first.  Upon returning, it resumes normally.  Still the best solitaire game I have found so far.
reviews.author: Dave Hurlbut

reviews.title: Crashes ALL the time
reviews.comment: I love this game but it crashes several times while playing. Annoying!
reviews.author: Jenn Sullivan

reviews.title: Great Time Waster
reviews.comment: I love solitaire and this is a great version of it.  Adapts to screen nicely and game play is smooth.  Record keeping is good and ads are small.
reviews.author: Michael Travis

reviews.title: Getting better all the time
reviews.comment: This is simply the best solitaire adaptation I\'ve seen for Android phones, but there is a small problem.  If you have the game paused and your screen times out or the phone rings, when you get back to the game all the cards will be face down and you will be unable to turn them over again.  You can continue to play, you just can\'t see what cards you\'re playing.  There used to be a horrible problem with posted high scores that were impossible to actually get, but the developer seems to have gotten that under control and deserves kudos for doing so, except now the daily and weekly scores never seem to reset.  Same high scores and player names every single day and 400+ scores posted just minutes after the scores should have reset.  It would also be nice if the game included a few of my favorite solitaire games besides Klondike...  Games like Four Kingdoms, Gaps and Limited would be very welcome in this app.
reviews.author: Bernhard Behling

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: I use this on android and after a few games it crashes every now and then.
reviews.author: Matt-n-Jojo P

reviews.title: Confusing!
reviews.comment: Will not play the game I want to play. Very frustrating. Will be uninstalling. :(

reviews.title: Won\'t open.
reviews.comment: Opens to the intro screen then goes no further. Don\'t even download game very sluggish. Will be uninstalling.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great game EVERY time. But can we have the same as iPad version: choose photos from phone to become wallpaper and many more card designs to choose. Thanks!

reviews.title: Love the game, app won\'t run.
reviews.comment: I had this app for three months, it worked fine, then without any update to game or phone, the app shuts down during the boot process. RAZR maxx hd.
